brewing_methods.name: Drip Coffee Maker
brewing_methods.description: Automatic machine that drips hot water through ground coffee
brewing_methods.instructions: Add coffee to filter, pour water into reservoir, turn on machine, wait for brewing to complete

brewing_methods.name: French Press
brewing_methods.description: Immersion brewing method using a plunger to separate grounds
brewing_methods.instructions: Add coffee to press, pour hot water over grounds, stir gently, place lid on top, steep 4 minutes, slowly press plunger down, pour immediately

brewing_methods.name: Pour Over
brewing_methods.description: Manual method pouring hot water over grounds in a filter cone
brewing_methods.instructions: Place filter in dripper and rinse with hot water, add coffee and shake to level, pour 40ml (2.5 tbsp) water to bloom for 30 seconds, slowly pour remaining water in circular motion over 2-3 minutes

brewing_methods.name: Espresso Machine
ingredients: 30ml (1 fl oz) water at 9 bars pressure
brewing_methods.instructions: Preheat machine, grind coffee fresh, distribute evenly in portafilter, tamp with 30lbs pressure, lock portafilter into group head, extract for 25-30 seconds

brewing_methods.name: Moka Pot
brewing_methods.description: Stovetop brewer that creates strong coffee using steam pressure
brewing_methods.instructions: Fill lower chamber with water to valve level, fill filter basket with coffee (don't tamp), assemble pot, place on medium heat, remove when upper chamber is full and you hear gurgling

brewing_methods.name: AeroPress
brewing_methods.description: Manual brewing device using air pressure
brewing_methods.instructions: Place filter in cap and rinse, attach cap to chamber, add coffee, pour water and stir for 10 seconds, insert plunger and press gently for 20-30 seconds

brewing_methods.name: Cold Brew
brewing_methods.description: Steeping grounds in cold water for extended time
brewing_methods.instructions: Combine coffee and cold water in container, stir to saturate grounds, cover and steep at room temperature or refrigerated for 12-24 hours, strain through fine filter or cheesecloth, dilute concentrate to taste

brewing_methods.name: Turkish Coffee
brewing_methods.description: Finely ground coffee boiled with water in a cezve/ibrik
ingredients: 1-2 teaspoons extra fine ground coffee per cup
brewing_methods.instructions: Mix coffee, water, and sugar in cezve, heat slowly without stirring, remove from heat when foam rises, return to heat and repeat 2-3 times, pour foam into cups first then coffee, let grounds settle before drinking

brewing_methods.name: Siphon/Vacuum Pot
brewing_methods.description: Theatrical brewing using vapor pressure and vacuum
brewing_methods.instructions: Fill lower chamber with water and heat, attach upper chamber with filter, when water rises add coffee and stir, brew for 1-2 minutes, remove from heat, coffee will filter down into lower chamber

brewing_methods.name: Percolator
brewing_methods.description: Cycles boiling water through grounds repeatedly
brewing_methods.instructions: Fill percolator with water, add coffee to basket, place on heat, water will cycle through grounds, percolate for 7-10 minutes, remove from heat when desired strength reached

brewing_methods.name: Vietnamese Phin
brewing_methods.description: Single-serve drip filter placed over cup
brewing_methods.instructions: Add condensed milk to cup if using, place phin on top of cup, add coffee to chamber, press filter insert gently onto coffee, pour small amount of water to bloom for 20 seconds, fill with remaining water, cover and let drip, stir and enjoy

brewing_methods.name: Cowboy Coffee
brewing_methods.description: Boiling grounds directly in water without filter
brewing_methods.instructions: Bring water to boil in pot, remove from heat, add coffee grounds, stir, let steep 4 minutes, add splash of cold water to settle grounds, pour carefully to avoid grounds

espresso_based_drinks.name: Espresso
espresso_based_drinks.instructions: Grind coffee fresh, distribute evenly in portafilter, tamp with 30lbs pressure, extract for 25-30 seconds

espresso_based_drinks.name: Doppio
espresso_based_drinks.instructions: Grind coffee fresh, distribute evenly in double portafilter, tamp with 30lbs pressure, extract for 25-30 seconds

espresso_based_drinks.name: Americano
espresso_based_drinks.instructions: Pull espresso shot(s) into cup, add hot water to desired strength

espresso_based_drinks.name: Long Black
espresso_based_drinks.instructions: Pour hot water into cup first, gently pull espresso shots directly into the water to preserve crema
espresso_based_drinks.description: Hot water with espresso poured over (preserves crema)

espresso_based_drinks.name: Cappuccino
espresso_based_drinks.instructions: Pull espresso shot into cup, steam milk to 150-155°F creating equal parts steamed milk and foam, pour steamed milk into espresso, spoon foam on top
espresso_based_drinks.description: Equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and foam

espresso_based_drinks.name: Latte
espresso_based_drinks.instructions: Pull espresso shot(s) into cup, steam milk to 150-155°F with microfoam, pour steamed milk over espresso in circular motion for latte art, top with light foam layer
espresso_based_drinks.description: Espresso with mostly steamed milk and light foam

espresso_based_drinks.name: Flat White
espresso_based_drinks.instructions: Pull double espresso into cup, steam milk to 140-150°F creating velvety microfoam texture, pour milk into espresso with latte art technique
espresso_based_drinks.description: Similar to latte but with less milk and velvety microfoam

espresso_based_drinks.name: Macchiato
espresso_based_drinks.instructions: Pull espresso shot into demitasse cup, steam small amount of milk, spoon a dollop of foam on top of espresso
espresso_based_drinks.description: Espresso marked with small amount of foam

espresso_based_drinks.name: Cortado
ingredients: 1 shot espresso (18-20g/0.6-0.7 oz coffee, 30ml/1 fl oz)
espresso_based_drinks.instructions: Pull espresso shot into small glass, steam equal amount of milk with minimal foam, pour steamed milk over espresso
espresso_based_drinks.description: Espresso cut with equal amount of steamed milk

espresso_based_drinks.name: Mocha
espresso_based_drinks.instructions: Add chocolate syrup to cup, pull espresso shot(s) and stir to mix chocolate, steam milk to 150-155°F, pour steamed milk over espresso-chocolate mixture, top with whipped cream

espresso_based_drinks.name: Affogato
ingredients: 1 scoop vanilla gelato or ice cream
espresso_based_drinks.instructions: Place scoop of gelato/ice cream in cup or bowl, pull fresh hot espresso shot, pour espresso directly over ice cream, serve immediately

espresso_based_drinks.name: Red Eye
espresso_based_drinks.grind_size: Medium for drip, Fine for espresso
ingredients: 240ml (1 cup) brewed drip coffee (15g/0.5 oz medium ground)
espresso_based_drinks.instructions: Brew regular drip coffee, pull espresso shot, add espresso shot to brewed coffee
espresso_based_drinks.description: Regular coffee with added espresso shot

espresso_based_drinks.name: Black Eye
espresso_based_drinks.grind_size: Medium for drip, Fine for espresso
ingredients: 240ml (1 cup) brewed drip coffee (15g/0.5 oz medium ground)
espresso_based_drinks.instructions: Brew regular drip coffee, pull two espresso shots, add espresso shots to brewed coffee
espresso_based_drinks.description: Regular coffee with two espresso shots

espresso_based_drinks.name: Dead Eye
espresso_based_drinks.grind_size: Medium for drip, Fine for espresso
ingredients: 240ml (1 cup) brewed drip coffee (15g/0.5 oz medium ground)
espresso_based_drinks.instructions: Brew regular drip coffee, pull three espresso shots, add espresso shots to brewed coffee
espresso_based_drinks.description: Regular coffee with three espresso shots

espresso_based_drinks.name: Ristretto
espresso_based_drinks.instructions: Grind coffee fresh, distribute evenly in portafilter, tamp with 30lbs pressure, extract for 15-20 seconds (stop extraction early for half the water)
espresso_based_drinks.description: Shorter, sweeter espresso shot with less water

espresso_based_drinks.name: Lungo
espresso_based_drinks.instructions: Grind coffee fresh, distribute evenly in portafilter, tamp with 30lbs pressure, extract for 45-60 seconds (let extraction run longer for double the water)
espresso_based_drinks.description: Longer espresso shot with more water

espresso_based_drinks.name: Breve
espresso_based_drinks.instructions: Pull espresso shot(s) into cup, steam half-and-half to 150-155°F (steams richer and thicker than milk), pour steamed half-and-half over espresso
espresso_based_drinks.description: Latte made with half-and-half instead of milk

cold_coffee_drinks.name: Iced Coffee
cold_coffee_drinks.instructions: Brew coffee at double strength (use half the water), let cool slightly for 5 minutes, fill glass with ice, pour hot coffee over ice

cold_coffee_drinks.name: Cold Brew
cold_coffee_drinks.instructions: Combine coffee and cold water in container, stir to saturate all grounds, cover and steep at room temperature or in refrigerator for 12-24 hours, strain through fine mesh filter or cheesecloth, dilute concentrate with equal parts water or milk, serve over ice
cold_coffee_drinks.description: Coffee steeped in cold water for 12-24 hours

cold_coffee_drinks.name: Nitro Cold Brew
ingredients: nitrogen gas (requires nitro tap system or cream whipper)
cold_coffee_drinks.instructions: Prepare cold brew concentrate using standard method, pour cold brew into nitro tap keg or cream whipper, charge with nitrogen, dispense into glass (no ice needed - nitrogen creates creamy texture)
cold_coffee_drinks.description: Cold brew infused with nitrogen for creamy texture

cold_coffee_drinks.name: Iced Latte
ingredients: 2 shots espresso (36-40g/1.3-1.4 oz fine ground coffee)
cold_coffee_drinks.instructions: Fill tall glass with ice, pour cold milk over ice, pull espresso shots directly over the milk and ice, stir gently
cold_coffee_drinks.description: Espresso with cold milk over ice

cold_coffee_drinks.name: Iced Americano
ingredients: 2 shots espresso (36-40g/1.3-1.4 oz fine ground coffee)
cold_coffee_drinks.instructions: Fill glass with ice, add cold water, pull espresso shots directly over ice and water, stir
cold_coffee_drinks.description: Espresso diluted with cold water over ice

cold_coffee_drinks.name: Frappé
cold_coffee_drinks.instructions: Add instant coffee, water, and sugar to cocktail shaker or jar, shake vigorously for 30 seconds until frothy, fill glass with ice, pour frothy coffee over ice, add cold milk, stir

cold_coffee_drinks.name: Frappuccino
cold_coffee_drinks.instructions: Brew strong coffee and let cool completely, add coffee, milk, ice, and sugar to blender, blend on high until smooth and slushy, pour into glass, top with whipped cream and drizzle

cold_coffee_drinks.name: Vietnamese Iced Coffee
cold_coffee_drinks.instructions: Add sweetened condensed milk to glass, place phin filter on top, add coffee and press insert gently, pour small amount of hot water to bloom 20 seconds, fill with remaining water and cover, let drip 4-5 minutes, stir coffee and condensed milk together, pour over glass of ice
cold_coffee_drinks.description: Strong coffee with sweetened condensed milk over ice

cold_coffee_drinks.name: Mazagran
cold_coffee_drinks.instructions: Pull espresso shots, mix with lemon juice and sugar while hot, stir until sugar dissolves, let cool to room temperature, pour over glass filled with ice

cold_coffee_drinks.name: Cold Foam Cold Brew
cold_coffee_drinks.instructions: Prepare cold brew and pour over ice in glass, add sugar to cold milk, froth milk using handheld frother or shake vigorously in jar for 30-60 seconds until thick foam forms, spoon cold foam over cold brew
cold_coffee_drinks.description: Cold brew topped with sweet cold foam

specialty_coffee_drinks.name: Irish Coffee
specialty_coffee_drinks.instructions: Brew strong coffee, warm glass with hot water then empty, add whiskey and brown sugar to glass, pour in hot coffee and stir until sugar dissolves, gently pour cream over back of spoon to float on top, do not stir
specialty_coffee_drinks.description: Coffee cocktail with whiskey and cream

specialty_coffee_drinks.name: Café au Lait
specialty_coffee_drinks.instructions: Brew coffee using drip or French press method, steam milk to 150-155°F, pour coffee and steamed milk simultaneously from both sides into cup, or pour coffee first then add steamed milk
specialty_coffee_drinks.description: French coffee with equal parts coffee and steamed milk

specialty_coffee_drinks.name: Café Cubano
specialty_coffee_drinks.instructions: Add coffee to moka pot filter basket, brew on stovetop, catch first few drops of espresso in cup with sugar, whip sugar and coffee drops vigorously until creamy espumita forms, pour remaining coffee over espumita, stir and serve
specialty_coffee_drinks.description: Sweet Cuban espresso with whipped sugar

specialty_coffee_drinks.name: Café Bombon
specialty_coffee_drinks.instructions: Pour sweetened condensed milk into clear glass, pull espresso shot, slowly pour hot espresso over the back of a spoon into glass to create distinct layers, serve without stirring to show layers, stir before drinking
specialty_coffee_drinks.description: Spanish coffee with condensed milk layers

specialty_coffee_drinks.name: Turkish Coffee
ingredients: 1-2 teaspoons extra fine ground coffee per small cup
specialty_coffee_drinks.instructions: Add coffee, water, sugar, and cardamom to cezve/ibrik, stir to combine, place on low heat without stirring, watch carefully as foam rises, remove from heat just before boiling over, return to heat and repeat foam rise 2-3 times, pour foam into cups first, then gently pour coffee, let grounds settle 1-2 minutes before drinking

specialty_coffee_drinks.name: Café de Olla
ingredients: 100g (0.5 cups) piloncillo or dark brown sugar
specialty_coffee_drinks.instructions: Add water, cinnamon, piloncillo, and spices to pot, bring to boil stirring until sugar dissolves, remove from heat, add coffee grounds and stir, cover and steep 5 minutes, strain through fine mesh or cheesecloth into cups
specialty_coffee_drinks.description: Mexican spiced coffee traditionally made in clay pot

specialty_coffee_drinks.name: Bulletproof Coffee
ingredients: 1-2 tablespoons MCT oil or coconut oil
specialty_coffee_drinks.instructions: Brew coffee using preferred method, add hot coffee, butter, and MCT oil to blender, blend on high for 20-30 seconds until frothy and creamy (like a latte), serve immediately
specialty_coffee_drinks.description: Blended coffee with fats for energy

specialty_coffee_drinks.name: Dalgona Coffee
specialty_coffee_drinks.instructions: Add instant coffee, sugar, and hot water to bowl, whisk vigorously by hand (400+ strokes) or use electric mixer for 2-3 minutes until thick, fluffy, and light caramel colored, fill glass with milk and ice if making iced version, spoon whipped coffee on top, stir before drinking
specialty_coffee_drinks.description: Whipped coffee foam over milk (Korean trend)

specialty_coffee_drinks.name: Espresso Tonic
specialty_coffee_drinks.instructions: Fill tall glass with ice, pour chilled tonic water over ice, pull espresso shots, slowly pour hot espresso over the tonic (watch it layer), optionally garnish with lime or lemon, let settle briefly before drinking
specialty_coffee_drinks.description: Refreshing combination of espresso and tonic

specialty_coffee_drinks.name: Coffee Milkshake
specialty_coffee_drinks.instructions: Brew strong coffee and chill completely in refrigerator, add cold coffee, ice cream, and milk to blender, blend until smooth and thick, pour into glass, top with whipped cream and chocolate drizzle
specialty_coffee_drinks.description: Blended coffee and ice cream drink

specialty_coffee_drinks.name: Café Liégeois
specialty_coffee_drinks.instructions: Brew strong coffee and chill thoroughly in refrigerator, place ice cream in tall glass, pour cold coffee over ice cream, top generously with whipped cream, garnish with chocolate shavings

specialty_coffee_drinks.name: Shakerato
specialty_coffee_drinks.instructions: Pull espresso shots into heat-safe container, add sugar and stir until dissolved, fill cocktail shaker with ice, pour hot espresso over ice, seal and shake vigorously for 10-15 seconds until very frothy, strain into chilled coupe or martini glass

flavored_variations.name: Vanilla Latte
flavored_variations.instructions: Add vanilla syrup to cup, pull espresso shots into cup, steam milk to 150-155°F, pour steamed milk over espresso creating latte art if desired

flavored_variations.name: Caramel Macchiato
flavored_variations.instructions: Add vanilla syrup to cup, steam milk to 150-155°F and pour into cup, pull espresso shots and pour over steamed milk (marking it), drizzle caramel sauce in crosshatch pattern on top

flavored_variations.name: Hazelnut Coffee
ingredients: 15g (0.5 oz) medium ground coffee per 240ml (1 cup)
flavored_variations.instructions: Brew coffee using your preferred method, add hazelnut syrup to cup, pour hot coffee over syrup and stir to combine

flavored_variations.name: Pumpkin Spice Latte
flavored_variations.instructions: Add pumpkin spice syrup to cup, pull espresso shots, steam milk to 150-155°F, pour steamed milk over espresso, top with whipped cream and sprinkle of pumpkin spice

flavored_variations.name: Peppermint Mocha
flavored_variations.instructions: Mix chocolate and peppermint syrups in cup, pull espresso shots and stir to combine, steam milk to 150-155°F, pour steamed milk over chocolate-espresso mixture, top with whipped cream and garnish

flavored_variations.name: Cinnamon Coffee
ingredients: 15g (0.5 oz) medium ground coffee per 240ml (1 cup)
flavored_variations.instructions: Mix ground cinnamon with coffee grounds before brewing, or add cinnamon stick to grounds, brew using preferred method, alternatively sprinkle cinnamon into brewed coffee and stir

flavored_variations.name: Honey Latte
flavored_variations.instructions: Add honey to cup, pull espresso shots over honey, stir vigorously until honey completely dissolves in hot espresso, steam milk to 150-155°F, pour steamed milk over honey-espresso mixture

flavored_variations.name: Lavender Latte
flavored_variations.instructions: Add lavender syrup to cup, pull espresso shots, steam milk to 150-155°F, pour steamed milk over espresso creating latte art if desired, optionally garnish with few lavender buds

coffee_to_water_ratio.espresso: 1:2 (18-20g/0.6-0.7 oz coffee to 36-40ml/1.3-1.4 fl oz water)
